Analysts are involved in an urgent effort to gauge the impact of Britains mass Covid-19 vaccine campaign and to pinpoint dates when lockdown measures can be eased.

articles.title: All over 18s could have vaccine by 'end of June' - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Whitehall sources say plan is to vaccinate four to five million people a week within months
articles.content:
A Department of Health spokesperson said: We do not recognise the 'internal target' referenced. Our aim is to offer priority groups 1-4 their first jab by February 15.
